translation.en: - Gregorio Cortez. - Ingrid! What are you doing here?
translation.ja: グレゴリオ ここで何(なに)してる？

translation.en: I thought you said you had book club tonight.
translation.ja: 読書会(どくしょかい)に行(い)くと

translation.en: And I thought you said you had bowling with the boys.
translation.ja: あなたは ボウリングでは？

translation.en: Well, since we're both here, let's make a night of it.
translation.ja: せっかくの機会(きかい)だ 今夜(こんや)は遊(あそ)ぼう

translation.en: They do say married couples with kids should go on more dates.
translation.ja: 夫婦(ふうふ)だって デートしたほうがいい

translation.en: Well, not exactly dinner and a movie, but it's better than nothing.
translation.ja: ディナーじゃないけど 何(なに)もないよりマシね ディナーじゃないけど 何(なに)もないよりマシね 緊急(きんきゅう)ミッション発動(はつどう) 緊急(きんきゅう)ミッション発動(はつどう)

translation.en: It looks like some sort of top- secret cybernetics program.
translation.ja: 緊急(きんきゅう)ミッション発動(はつどう) 極秘(ごくひ)のサイバネティック プログラムだ 極秘(ごくひ)のサイバネティック プログラムだ

translation.en: Give me a few seconds, and we'll have all the info we need.
translation.ja: 必要(ひつよう)な情報(じょうほう)を 取(と)り出すわ

translation.en: If we leave now, we can probably catch a movie downtown.
translation.ja: 〝ダウンロード完了(かんりょう)〞 〝ダウンロード完了(かんりょう)〞 これから街(まち)に出て 映画(えいが)でも… これから街(まち)に出て 映画(えいが)でも…

translation.en: I am sorry, my dear, but it looks like our plans have been postponed.
translation.ja: 悪(わる)いが ふたりきりの 楽(たの)しい夜(よる)は延期(えんき)だ

translation.en: Are you kidding? This date night just got interesting.
translation.ja: 冗談(じょうだん)でしょ？ 楽(たの)しくなってきた

translation.en: Let's end this quickly. Combination 61, the Aztec Death Spiral.
translation.ja: 早く片付(かたづ)けよう “アステカの デススパイラル”

translation.en: Reverse Death Spiral? No, impossible! That move is classified!
translation.ja: 攻撃(こうげき)を返(かえ)された あり得(え)ん　秘密(ひみつ)の技(わざ)だぞ

translation.en: - Who are these guys? - SWAMP. I've never heard of them.
translation.ja: 何者(なにもの)なの？ スワンプ？ 聞(き)いたことがない

translation.en: - Gregorio! -
translation.ja: 大変(たいへん)だわ

translation.en: Oh, no, the files!
translation.ja: ファイルが！ ファイルが！ 〝取(と)り外(はず)し〞

translation.en: To the transport! Mission complete!
translation.ja: 撤収(てっしゅう)する　任務完了(にんむかんりょう)だ

translation.en: We're too late! We're never too late.
translation.ja: 遅(おそ)かった　逃(に)げられたわ

translation.en: - Gregorio, who was that? - Our worst nightmare.
translation.ja: あいつは誰(だれ)？ 最悪(さいあく)の敵(てき)だ

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Breakfast Burrito.
translation.ja: スパイ組織本部(そしきほんぶ) 翌朝(よくあさ) ごめんね ブリトーさん

translation.en: I know we just met, but I need to eat you now. What the-- ?
translation.ja: 会(あ)ったばかりだけど いただき… え？

translation.en: - Juni, get your own burrito! -
translation.ja: ジュニ　返(かえ)して

translation.en: Oh, this is so on.
translation.ja: まったく 見てなさい

translation.en: - Hi, Carmen. New toy? - Early middle school graduation gift.
translation.ja: 新(あたら)しいおもちゃ？ 中学卒業(そつぎょう)のお祝(いわ)い

translation.en: One of the perks of having super spies for parents. And those?
translation.ja: スパイの両親(りょうしん)に感謝(かんしゃ)ね そのくつは？

translation.en: Zero- gravity boots. Built them myself in the lab this morning.
translation.ja: 無重力(むじゅうりょく)ブーツ 自分(じぶん)で作(つく)ったんだ

translation.en: One of the perks of living in a super spy facility.
translation.ja: スパイ施設(しせつ)に住(す)んでるおかげ

translation.en: - Uh- huh. My breakfast burrito? - I think you mean my breakfast burrito.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)のブリトー返(かえ)して これは ボクのブリトーだよ

translation.en: Hmm. I've got just the blob for the job.
translation.ja: これでもくらえ

translation.en: - - Aha! Got it!
translation.ja: よし！

translation.en: Strategy always wins over force.
translation.ja: パワーよりも 戦略(せんりゃく)が大事(だいじ)なの

translation.en: Huh. You might have a point.
translation.ja: へえ そうかもね

translation.en: Ugh, you are a vile little man.
translation.ja: 何(なに)すんのよ 下品(げひん)なヤツ

translation.en: Correction, a vile little man
translation.ja: ブリトーをもつ 下品(げひん)なヤツでしょ

translation.en: - with a burrito. - It was like they knew every move.
translation.ja: ブリトーをもつ 下品(げひん)なヤツでしょ 行動(こうどう)が読(よ)まれてる

translation.en: Shh! Did you hear that? Sounds like secret spy stuff.
translation.ja: 聞(き)いた？　何(なに)かあったみたい

translation.en: Hey, Dad. Everything okay?
translation.ja: パパ 何(なに)かあったの？

translation.en: - Have you been up all night? - OSS agents all over the globe
translation.ja: 寝(ね)てないの？ 我々(われわれ)の仲間(なかま)が 任務(にんむ)に失敗(しっぱい)している

translation.en: have been failing their missions because of a counter- spy agency
translation.ja: 我々(われわれ)の仲間(なかま)が 任務(にんむ)に失敗(しっぱい)している 敵(てき)のスパイが現(あらわ)れた

translation.en: calling themselves SWAMP.
translation.ja: 通称(つうしょう) スワンプ

translation.en: Sinister Wrongdoers Against Mankind's Preservation.
translation.ja: 〝人類(じんるい)に立ちはだかる 悪(あく)の集団(しゅうだん)〞

translation.en: - Hmm. Catchy. - And all our agents said the same thing
translation.ja: 斬新(ざんしん)だ みんな 同(おな)じことを言(い)ってる

translation.en: about their encounters.
translation.ja: みんな 同(おな)じことを言(い)ってる

translation.en: - It was like they knew every move! - They were always one step ahead.
translation.ja: 行動(こうどう)が読(よ)まれてる 一歩先(いっぽさき)を行(い)かれてる

translation.en: Your mother and I faced off against them last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜(さくや) パパたちも遭遇(そうぐう)した

translation.en: Everything the agents say is true.
translation.ja: 彼(かれ)らの言(い)うことは本当(ほんとう)だ

translation.en: Wait, I thought she had book club and you went bowling.
translation.ja: 待(ま)って ママは読書会(どくしょかい)で パパは…

translation.en: - Hey! - How is that possible?
translation.ja: ありえない

translation.en: OSS operatives are the best spies in the world. All your moves are classified.
translation.ja: ＯＳＳのスパイは世界一(せかいいち)だし 情報(じょうほう)は極秘(ごくひ)よね

translation.en: Unless they knew that information from the start.
translation.ja: 情報(じょうほう)が 漏(も)れていなければの話(はなし)だ

translation.en: But how?
translation.ja: まさか！

translation.en: Several years ago, I headed up a top- secret OSS initiative
translation.ja: パパは 極秘(ごくひ)プロジェクトの リーダーだった

translation.en: called The Third Brain Program.
translation.ja: その名も“第(だい)３の脳(のう)”

translation.en: The goal of this program was to create artificial intelligence equivalent to the intelligence of our best spies.
translation.ja: 優秀(ゆうしゅう)なスパイの脳(のう)に匹敵(ひってき)する 人工知能(じんこうちのう)を作(つく)っていた

translation.en: But the program was eventually disbanded when our experiments proved futile.
translation.ja: だが プロジェクトは 解散(かいさん)になった

translation.en: And we disposed of all the bad brains.
translation.ja: そして出来(でき)の悪(わる)い脳(のう)は 処分(しょぶん)した

translation.en: But there was one brain that could not be destroyed. A golden one.
translation.ja: しかし１つだけ 壊(こわ)せなかった脳(のう)がある ゴールデンブレインだ

translation.en: We took every precaution to lock Golden Brain safely away, but...
translation.ja: 用心(ようじん)のため安全(あんぜん)なところに 保管(ほかん)したんだが…

translation.en: Greetings, Gregorio, or should I call you Father? Ugh.
translation.ja: やあ グレゴリオ “父(とう)さん”と呼(よ)ぶべきか

translation.en: Despite your best efforts to destroy me, I continued to grow on my own.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)を破壊(はかい)しようとしたな 私(わたし)は自分(じぶん)の力で成長(せいちょう)した

translation.en: Yes, your wittle brain is all grown up, Gregorio. As you can see,
translation.ja: 君(きみ)のかわいい脳(のう)は 大人になったよ 見てのとおり

translation.en: I escaped the flimsy containment unit that you constructed for me,
translation.ja: 君(きみ)が作(つく)った貧弱(ひんじゃく)な容器(ようき)から 私(わたし)は逃(に)げ出した

translation.en: built a cybernetic body for myself,
translation.ja: そして自(みず)ら 体(からだ)を作(つく)り

translation.en: and assembled a new counter- spy organization with one goal in mind.
translation.ja: 新(あたら)しいスパイ組織(そしき)を作(つく)った 我々(われわれ)の目的(もくてき)は１つ

translation.en: Taking over the world.
translation.ja: 世界(せかい)を征服(せいふく)することだ

translation.en: But to do that, I must first destroy the ones that created me, the OSS.
translation.ja: だが まず私(わたし)を作(つく)った ヤツらを倒(たお)さねば つまりＯＳＳを

translation.en: - Holy Frankenstein's monster, Dad- man! - Oh, and you're probably wondering
translation.ja: フランケンシュタインの 怪物(かいぶつ)かよ なぜ 君(きみ)たちの行動(こうどう)は 極秘(ごくひ)なのに

translation.en: how my men have been able to defeat you so easily
translation.ja: なぜ 君(きみ)たちの行動(こうどう)は 極秘(ごくひ)なのに

translation.en: when all your moves are classified.
translation.ja: 我々(われわれ)は簡単(かんたん)に倒(たお)せたか

translation.en: Well, technically, as a former agent of the OSS,
translation.ja: 私(わたし)がＯＳＳの スパイだったからだ

translation.en: I still had access to all the operative files, which I've stolen.
translation.ja: 諜報員(ちょうほういん)のデータにアクセスし 全(すべ)て盗(ぬす)んだのさ

translation.en: That's right. The big secrety secret agents can't keep their own secrets safe.
translation.ja: 有能(ゆうのう)なスパイが自分(じぶん)の秘密(ひみつ)を 守(まも)れていないとは

translation.en: I know you better than you know yourselves.
translation.ja: 君(きみ)たちのことは 熟知(じゅくち)しているよ

translation.en: Ta- ta for now, Gregorio. I look forward to our big reunion.
translation.ja: じゃあバイバイだ 再会(さいかい)するのが楽(たの)しみだ

translation.en: But you're gonna stop him. I mean, it. Right, Dad?
translation.ja: パパなら止(と)められるでしょ

translation.en: - What did he mean by our big reunion? -
translation.ja: “再会(さいかい)が楽(たの)しみ”って？

translation.en: SWAMP.
translation.ja: スワンプだ

translation.en: Okay. Junito, Carmen, find a safe hiding spot.
translation.ja: 安全(あんぜん)なところに隠(かく)れてなさい

translation.en: We will come back when this is all over.
translation.ja: あとで迎(むか)えに行(い)く

translation.en: - But-- - You heard me. Now, go!
translation.ja: でも… 早く行(い)くんだ

translation.en: We can't just leave them out there, Carm. What can we do?
translation.ja: ただ見てるだけなんてヤダよ

translation.en: - What we should do, we fight. - I was really hoping you'd say that.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)たちも戦(たたか)おう そうこなくちゃ

translation.en: I got a read on them! Up ahead! There's a bunch of SWAMP goons between us.
translation.ja: パパとママは　あそこ！ でも敵(てき)が多(おお)すぎる

translation.en: - We need to find a way around them. - Unh- unh. Not the plan I had in mind, sis.
translation.ja: 道(みち)を見つけなきゃ ボクならこうするね

translation.en: - Juni! -
translation.ja: ジュニ！

translation.en: SWAMP? Great name, you guys. Was FART or BARF already taken?
translation.ja: スワンプだったっけ バカとかゲロはダメ？

translation.en: - Um, can you stop being reckless? - You call it reckless, I call it winning.
translation.ja: 無茶(むちゃ)しないでよ ボクは敵(てき)を倒(たお)してるんだよ

translation.en: Little brothers.
translation.ja: 子どもなんだから

translation.en: - What do we do? - Do not give up.
translation.ja: どうしよう？ 諦(あきら)めるな

translation.en: - - Whoo- hoo! Coming in hot!
translation.ja: くらえ！

translation.en: - Come on! That all you got? - Coming through!
translation.ja: 大したことないな 行(い)くわよ

translation.en: - Are you done winning? - Whoa!
translation.ja: もう気が済(す)んだ？

translation.en: Ay! Junito! Carmen!
translation.ja: ジュニ！　カルメン！

translation.en: It's Golden Brain!
translation.ja: ゴールデンブレインだ

translation.en: The OSS is no more!
translation.ja: ＯＳＳは終(お)わりだ

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: そんな…

translation.en: I have no choice but to scatter all agents to safe houses around the world
translation.ja: 〝セキュリティー侵害(しんがい)〞 他(ほか)に道(みち)はない 〝セキュリティー侵害(しんがい)〞 〝セキュリティー侵害(しんがい)〞 ヤツを倒(たお)す方法(ほうほう)を 思(おも)いつくまで

translation.en: until I can figure out a way to defeat Golden Brain.
translation.ja: 各地(かくち)の隠(かく)れ家(が)に潜(ひそ)んでくれ

translation.en: The agency has been exposed. And we're all at risk.
translation.ja: 組織(そしき)は暴(あば)かれ 危険(きけん)な状況(じょうきょう)だ

translation.en: Golden Brain will stop at nothing until he finishes the job.
translation.ja: 敵(てき)は目的(もくてき)を果(は)たすまで 手をゆるめないだろう

translation.en: I'm sorry, friends. Agent Cortez out.
translation.ja: すまない コルテスからは以上(いじょう)だ

translation.en: Don't worry, Dad. You'll come up with something. You always do.
translation.ja: 元気(げんき)だして いい方法(ほうほう)は見つかる

translation.en: But how do we stop a villain that knows us better than we know ourselves?
translation.ja: 敵(てき)はパパたちを熟知(じゅくち)してる どうすれば？

translation.en: And we haven't even begun to discuss this, eh?
translation.ja: それと お前(まえ)たち！

translation.en: You two are going to be grounded until your mid- 40s! Of all the reckless,
translation.ja: 40歳半(さいなか)ばまで 外出禁止(がいしゅつきんし)にするぞ 無茶(むちゃ)で危険(きけん)なことを…

translation.en: dangerous...
translation.ja: 無茶(むちゃ)で危険(きけん)なことを…

translation.en: - That's it. - What is?
translation.ja: これだ なにが？

translation.en: Who cares? He's smiling. Maybe we won't get grounded after all.
translation.ja: なんでもいいって 外出禁止(がいしゅつきんし)はナシかも

translation.en: I have a plan on how to stop Golden Brain and get the OSS operational again.
translation.ja: これでヤツを倒(たお)し ＯＳＳを復活(ふっかつ)させるぞ

translation.en: - - Um,
translation.ja: タコビュート 場所(ばしょ) 街(まち)の中心部(ちゅうしんぶ) 月曜日(げつようび)

translation.en: so how exactly is this the answer to defeating Golden Brain?
translation.ja: このお店(みせ)と敵(てき)を倒(たお)すことに 関係(かんけい)が？

translation.en: Are we planning on giving all of SWAMP food poisoning?
translation.ja: スワンプ内(ない)で 食中毒(しょくちゅうどく)でも出す？

translation.en: Oh, no, this is even worse than I thought, Carmen. We're not grounded.
translation.ja: 思(おも)ってたよりも ひどい 外出禁止(がいしゅつきんし)じゃなくて 働(はたら)かされる

translation.en: - He got us jobs! - Dad, I know it was dumb for us
translation.ja: 外出禁止(がいしゅつきんし)じゃなくて 働(はたら)かされる 勝手(かって)に戦(たたか)ったのはバカだった

translation.en: to join the battle, but this is a little extreme, don't you think?
translation.ja: 勝手(かって)に戦(たたか)ったのはバカだった でも これは極端(きょくたん)じゃない？

translation.en: You know, there's very strict child labor laws in this county.
translation.ja: 子どもの労働(ろうどう)については 法律(ほうりつ)がある

translation.en: - Follow me. -
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: - This is your fault! - My fault?
translation.ja: あんたのせいよ あのとき 言(い)っただろ

translation.en: You're the one that was all, We fight.
translation.ja: あのとき 言(い)っただろ “戦(たたか)おう”って

translation.en: Uh, this just took a turn for the creepy.
translation.ja: 気味(きみ)が悪(わる)くない？

translation.en: You go first.
translation.ja: 先に行(い)って

translation.en: One mile. Ten miles. Sixty miles.
translation.ja: ２キロ　16キロ　100キロ…

translation.en: One hundred eighty miles. Destination.
translation.ja: 300キロ下降(かこう) 到着(とうちゃく)しました

translation.en: Not gonna lie. You might want to back away. Taco Butte coming up.
translation.ja: 離(はな)れたほうがいい ホントに吐(は)きそう

translation.en: - What is this place? - You will see.
translation.ja: ここはどこ？ すぐわかる

translation.en: - Welcome to OSS Spy Academy. - Whoa!
translation.ja: ようこそ ＯＳＳスパイアカデミーへ

translation.en: So you and Mom were trained here when you were teenagers?
translation.ja: パパたちも ここの生徒(せいと)だったの？

translation.en: Yes, but this facility has been closed for many years.
translation.ja: ええ でも学校は 閉鎖(へいさ)されてた

translation.en: Closed until a few days ago, when you gave me the idea to re- open it.
translation.ja: 再開(さいかい)したばかりだ お前(まえ)たちのおかげで 思(おも)いついた

translation.en: No one knows about this place,
translation.ja: この学校は敵(てき)も知(し)らない

translation.en: - not even Golden Brain. - We gave you the idea?
translation.ja: この学校は敵(てき)も知(し)らない 私(わたし)たちのおかげ？

translation.en: Yes. If the past is our enemy, then the future might be our salvation.
translation.ja: そうだ 過去(かこ)が敵(てき)になっても 未来(みらい)は味方(みかた)かも

translation.en: - Not following. - You were the only agents in the fight
translation.ja: わかんない ふたりのファイルは 存在(そんざい)しないから

translation.en: Golden Brain's men weren't able to get a step on because there's no file on you.
translation.ja: ふたりのファイルは 存在(そんざい)しないから 敵(てき)を倒(たお)せたのよ

translation.en: Golden Brain knows every old operative, so the OSS...
translation.ja: 今(いま)いるスパイは 熟知(じゅくち)されてるから…

translation.en: Must train new ones.
translation.ja: 新(あたら)しいスパイを育(そだ)てる

translation.en: So I have assembled the best teen spy cadets from around the globe
translation.ja: スパイの素質(そしつ)がある 10代(だい)の優(すぐ)れた候補生(こうほせい)を

translation.en: to become the next generation of OSS agents.
translation.ja: 世界各地(せかいかくち)からここに集(あつ)めた

translation.en: I knew you would figure it out, Dad. You're full of surprises.
translation.ja: やっぱり パパはすごいね

translation.en: Hm, yes.
translation.ja: それから もう１つある

translation.en: And I have one more. You will further your training here at the academy...
translation.ja: それから もう１つある ふたりには スパイの訓練(くんれん)を受(う)けながら

translation.en: - What? - ...while undertaking
translation.ja: ふたりには スパイの訓練(くんれん)を受(う)けながら

translation.en: your most difficult mission yet. Code name: Mission Critical.
translation.ja: 重要(じゅうよう)な任務(にんむ)“ミッション･ クリティカル”を任(まか)せる

translation.en: With the OSS out of commission, time is of the essence.
translation.ja: ＯＳＳが活動(かつどう)できない今(いま) 時間(じかん)は大切(たいせつ)だ

translation.en: Golden Brain's forces are mounting.
translation.ja: 敵(てき)は力をつけている

translation.en: You are the only ones that can keep him in check and bring SWAMP down.
translation.ja: お前(まえ)たちが あいつを止(と)め― スワンプを叩(たた)きつぶすんだ

translation.en: Defeat an entire counter- spy organization by ourselves?
translation.ja: ふたりだけで 敵(てき)のスパイ組織(そしき)を倒(たお)すの？

translation.en: No, you'll need a team.
translation.ja: チームでやるのよ

translation.en: And together, you'll find your team here among these new cadets.
translation.ja: ふたりでメンバーを選(えら)ぶの 候補生(こうほせい)の中からね

translation.en: Wait, our team?
translation.ja: ふたりのチーム？

translation.en: Yes, Mission Critical will be your team, and you will lead it together.
translation.ja: そうよ ミッション･クリティカルを ふたりで導(みちび)くの

translation.en: - Together? Him? Me? - Nuh- uh, I work solo. Lone wolf.
translation.ja: ふたりで？ ジュニと私(わたし)が？ ヤダね　ひとりでやる

translation.en: Ay! Nonsense. You were born leaders. It's in your blood.
translation.ja: お前(まえ)たちには リーダーの素質(そしつ)がある

translation.en: Mission Critical must work, for the future of mankind.
translation.ja: この任務(にんむ)には 人類(じんるい)の未来(みらい)がかかっている

translation.en: In the meantime, your mother and I are going into deep cover,  like the rest of the agents.
translation.ja: パパたちや諜報員(ちょうほういん)たちは 身(み)を隠(かく)すが

translation.en: But we will not be far. Good luck. The entire world is counting on you.
translation.ja: 見守(みまも)っているぞ　しっかりな お前(まえ)たちは未来(みらい)の希望(きぼう)だ

translation.en: Well, I guess we should get to work then, huh?
translation.ja: じゃあ… そろそろ始(はじ)めようか

translation.en: Yeah, it would seem that we have a whole world to save.
translation.ja: うん 世界(せかい)を救(すく)わないとね

translation.en: How hard could that be?
translation.ja: 楽勝(らくしょう)だよ

translation.en: To defeat a villain like Golden Brain,  Mission Critical has to be all about strategy.
translation.ja: 悪者(わるもの)を倒(たお)すのに 何(なに)よりも大切(たいせつ)なのは戦略(せんりゃく)よ

translation.en: Nuh- uh, Mission Critical has to be all about kicking butt.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)う　大切(たいせつ)なのは ぶっつぶす力だ

translation.en: OMG! Totes love your jumpsuit!
translation.ja: ヤバイ！ 服(ふく)サイコー

translation.en: - Oh, and your hair? Adorbs! Selfie! -
translation.ja: 髪(かみ)もステキ！ チーズ！

translation.en: The name's Glitch. Techno- espionage, code- breaking, genius level IQ,
translation.ja: 私はグリッチ テクノスパイよ

translation.en: incredible fashion sense.
translation.ja: 服(ふく)のセンス抜群(ばつぐん)

translation.en: LOL. #FullPackage.
translation.ja: 超(ちょう)うける ＃私(わたし)ってサイコー

translation.en: Am I right? Just texted you all my info, set up our own private e- mail server,
translation.ja: 超(ちょう)うける ＃私(わたし)ってサイコー 専用(せんよう)のサーバーを作(つく)ったの

translation.en: and got us access to every computer on the Earth.
translation.ja: 全(すべ)てのパソコンに アクセスできるわ

translation.en: - Besties for life! -
translation.ja: 一生マブダチ！

translation.en: - Very promising. - Wait, you understood her?
translation.ja: 頼(たの)もしい子 理解(りかい)できた？

translation.en: The next applicant was supposed to be here already.
translation.ja: 次(つぎ)の候補者(こうほしゃ)は まだ？

translation.en: And I am, my dear.
translation.ja: お呼(よ)びかな？

translation.en: The name is Awesome, Sir Awesome.
translation.ja: ボクはオーサム “オーサム様(さま)”と

translation.en: Super spy, expert linguist and master of disguise.
translation.ja: スーパースパイだ 言語(げんご)をあやつる変装(へんそう)の名人

translation.en: Fluent in over 300 languages, including my own, Awesomese.
translation.ja: 話(はな)せる言語(げんご)は300以上(いじょう) ボク独自(どくじ)のオーサム語(ご)もね

translation.en: Do you always work with theme music?
translation.ja: 任務中(にんむちゅう)も曲(きょく)をかけるの？

translation.en: That should come in handy for stealth missions. Anyway...
translation.ja: 敵(てき)に居場所(いばしょ)がバレバレ じゃあ…

translation.en: Now, if you'll please excuse me, I have a prior engagement.
translation.ja: もう失礼(しつれい)する 約束(やくそく)があるんだ

translation.en: - - Ow!
translation.ja: 痛(いた)い！

translation.en: He's great!
translation.ja: すごいヤツだ

translation.en: All these applicants have excellent test scores on their cognitive reasoning exams.
translation.ja: 面接(めんせつ)した候補者(こうほしゃ)は 全員(ぜんいん) 適性(てきせい)テストの点(てん)が高(たか)い

translation.en: Snore! None of them have cool code names or great costumes. Pass.
translation.ja: コードネームも見た目も ダサいからダメ

translation.en: Cool code names? Great costumes? - That's your criteria? - Yeah.
translation.ja: コードネームと見た目が 選(えら)ぶ基準(きじゅん)？

translation.en: Everyone knows the key to kicking butt is intimidation.
translation.ja: 相手(あいて)をぶっつぶすには 強(つよ)そうに見せないと

translation.en: - - So dreamy.
translation.ja: 夢(ゆめ)みたい

translation.en: Barfsville! Look at them! So unprofessional!
translation.ja: 最悪(さいあく)だな スパイの自覚(じかく)がない

translation.en: - - Yep, I see where this is headed.
translation.ja: イヤな予感(よかん)がする

translation.en: - Name? - Ace, mate.
translation.ja: 名前(なまえ)は？ エースだぜ

translation.en: - Okay, Ace- Mate, I see that you did okay-- - Not Ace- Mate. Just Ace, mate.
translation.ja: “エースだぜ”くん 成績(せいせき)は… 違(ちが)う　名前(なまえ)は“エース”だぜ

translation.en: Clearly, there is some sort of language barrier here. I think that--
translation.ja: 同(おな)じ言葉(ことば)を しゃべってるとは思(おも)えない…

translation.en: I see you graduated top of your class at Junior Marksman's Academy.
translation.ja: 射撃(しゃげき)学校を 成績(せいせき)トップで卒業(そつぎょう)したのね

translation.en: There's no weapon I can't master. Slingshot, laser pistol.
translation.ja: 武器(ぶき)なら任(まか)せて パチンコやレーザー銃(じゅう)

translation.en: I can use it to knock the eyelash off a mozzie at 300 yards.
translation.ja: 遠(とお)くにいる 蚊(か)のまつ毛(げ)も撃(う)ち落(お)とせる

translation.en: Okay, Ace- Mate, that'll do. We'll be in touch.
translation.ja: “エースだぜ”くん 面接(めんせつ)は以上(いじょう)だ

translation.en: - Man, what was with that guy? - Cool code name, great costume.
translation.ja: いけ好(す)かない野郎(やろう)だ コードネームも 見た目もステキ

translation.en: Nuh- uh, no one's that perfect.
translation.ja: そんなヤツ存在(そんざい)しない

translation.en: Well, since we can't come to an agreement on anyone,
translation.ja: まったく意見(いけん)があわない 全然(ぜんぜん)ダメ！

translation.en: we'll each get two picks for the team. No questions asked. Fair?
translation.ja: ふたりずつ選(えら)ぼう お互(たが)いに文句(もんく)はなし どう？

translation.en: Finally, we can agree on something. Let's head back to the dorms
translation.ja: やっと意見(いけん)があった 明日(あした)トレーニングセンターで 顔合(かおあ)わせしよう

translation.en: and meet tomorrow at the training center to see how our prospects work together.
translation.ja: 明日(あした)トレーニングセンターで 顔合(かおあ)わせしよう

translation.en: Deal?
translation.ja: いい？

translation.en: Huh? A Thumb- Thumb? How did that get in here? Stand down, creature!
translation.ja: サムサムが なんでいるの？ 出てって

translation.en: - Tom Thumb- Thumb is with me. - And might I ask who me is?
translation.ja: トムサムサムは相棒(あいぼう)よ そういうあんたは誰(だれ)？

translation.en: The code name's Scorpion,
translation.ja: コードネームは スコーピオン　本名は…

translation.en: but you'd probably know me best by my civilian name, Claudia Floop.
translation.ja: コードネームは スコーピオン　本名は… クラウディア･フループ

translation.en: Floop? As in our former enemy, Fegan Floop?
translation.ja: むかし敵(てき)だったフループ？

translation.en: - The same. He is my father. - Your father?
translation.ja: フェーガンは私(わたし)の父(ちち) だから サムサムがいるのね

translation.en: That explains the Thumb- Thumb. But not why you're standing in my dorm room.
translation.ja: だから サムサムがいるのね なんで私(わたし)の部屋(へや)に？

translation.en: I'm here for the Mission Critical team. I apologize for being late.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)も 候補者(こうほしゃ)なの 遅(おく)れて悪(わる)かったわ

translation.en: I was supposed to be here a few days ago, but I had a fashion shoot in Prague.
translation.ja: プラハで急(きゅう)な撮影(さつえい)が 入って大変(たいへん)だったの

translation.en: You know how that is.
translation.ja: わかるでしょ？

translation.en: No, you probably don't.
translation.ja: わかるはずないわね

translation.en: Fegan Floop's daughter wants to be considered for the Mission Critical team?
translation.ja: フループの娘(むすめ)が 私(わたし)たちのチームに？

translation.en: Now I've heard everything. Wait, did you re- decorate my room?
translation.ja: 信(しん)じられないわ 待(ま)って 勝手(かって)に部屋(へや)をいじった？

translation.en: - Yes, it lacked panache. - I'll give you panache.
translation.ja: ええ　華(はな)がなかったから あんたをいじってやる…

translation.en: Hey, hey! Ooh, who's the new roomie? Whoa!
translation.ja: あら 新(あたら)しいルームメイト？

translation.en: - Totes vibing on the new look! Panache! -
translation.ja: この部屋(へや) 華(はな)があるね！

translation.en: Hmm, looks like you're one cadet shy.
translation.ja: ひとり足りないけど？

translation.en: - Oh, he'll be here... I hope. - This is bad form, Junior.
translation.ja: もう来(く)るよ　たぶん やばいな ジュニア

translation.en: It's Juni! Ju- ni! And call me by my code name. Aztec, Ace- Mate.
translation.ja: ボクの名前(なまえ)はジュニだ アステカと呼(よ)んでくれ “エースだぜ”

translation.en: Again, it's just Ace, mate. Not Ace- Mate.
translation.ja: だから ボクの名前(なまえ)は “エース”だぜ

translation.en: I still don't hear the difference.
translation.ja: まだ違(ちが)いがわからない

translation.en: Well, it looks like I get another candidate selection
translation.ja: 候補者(こうほしゃ)が現(あらわ)れないなら 私(わたし)がもうひとり選(えら)べるわね

translation.en: - since your candidate didn't show, so... - Am I interrupting?
translation.ja: 候補者(こうほしゃ)が現(あらわ)れないなら 私(わたし)がもうひとり選(えら)べるわね いい？

translation.en: - Yes, you are. We were just-- - No, no, no.
translation.ja: いま取(と)り込(こ)み中… 全然(ぜんぜん) 問題(もんだい)ない 時間(じかん)ピッタリだ

translation.en: - Not at all. You're just in time. - Are you crazy? Do you know who that is?
translation.ja: 全然(ぜんぜん) 問題(もんだい)ない 時間(じかん)ピッタリだ 誰(だれ)だか知(し)ってんの？

translation.en: That's Claudia Floop, Fegan Floop's daughter?
translation.ja: フェーガン･フループの娘(むすめ)

translation.en: The daughter of a villain? She can't be trusted.
translation.ja: ワルの娘(むすめ)よ　信用(しんよう)できない

translation.en: Remember what you said, no questions asked.
translation.ja: 言(い)ってたじゃん 文句(もんく)はなしだって

translation.en: Mission Critical prospects, the test begins now!
translation.ja: ミッション･クリティカル テスト始(はじ)め

translation.en: Attack!
translation.ja: 攻撃(こうげき)！

translation.en: - Evade! -
translation.ja: 避(よ)けて

translation.en: Okay, team, let's show 'em how it's done! Full- out attack! Kick butt!
translation.ja: ボクらのやり方(かた)でやろう 総攻撃(そうこうげき)だ　ぶっつぶせ

translation.en: No! Evasive action!
translation.ja: ダメ！　避(よ)けて

translation.en: Attack!
translation.ja: 攻撃(こうげき)！

translation.en: Evade!
translation.ja: 避(よ)けて！

translation.en: - Mission Critical, attack! - Mission Critical, evade!
translation.ja: 攻撃(こうげき)だ 避(よ)けるの

translation.en: - Evade! -
translation.ja: 避(よ)けて！

translation.en: Attack!
translation.ja: 攻(せ)めろ

translation.en: - Evade! -
translation.ja: 避(よ)けて

translation.en: - Juni, what are you doing? - Leading the team! Get outta my way, Carm!
translation.ja: 何(なに)してるのよ？ チームを引(ひ)っ張(ぱ)ってるんだよ

translation.en: Carmen!
translation.ja: 怒(おこ)ったぞ

translation.en: Oh.  Hey, Mom. Hey, Dad. How's deep cover?
translation.ja: ママ 元気(げんき)？ パパも どうしてたの？

translation.en: - Unacceptable. Embarrassing! - What your father is trying to say
translation.ja: さっきのはなんだ！ パパが言(い)いたいのはね

translation.en: is that you must come to an agreement on how to run this team.
translation.ja: ふたりで 協力(きょうりょく)しなさいってこと

translation.en: I know how to run it! She just won't listen to reason!
translation.ja: わかってるけど 聞(き)いてくれない

translation.en: Reason? Your way will get us all killed.
translation.ja: あんたのやり方(かた)じゃ全滅(ぜんめつ)よ

translation.en: - And your way will bore us all to death. - Enough, you two!
translation.ja: そっちのやり方(かた)は退屈(たいくつ) やめなさい

translation.en: Sure, you've had your differences lately, but you've always been there for each other.
translation.ja: 近頃(ちかごろ) よく争(あらそ)ってるけど 思(おも)い出して

translation.en: Juni, remember in kindergarten, when Jeffy Rice took your favorite cuddle bear?
translation.ja: ジュニ　クマのぬいぐるみを 友(とも)だちに取(と)られたとき

translation.en: Who made him give it back?
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)が取(と)り返(かえ)した？

translation.en: And, Carmen, who was always the first one to volunteer as a test subject
translation.ja: カルメン 科学(かがく)フェアの出し物(もの)を 最初(さいしょ)に試(ため)してたのは 誰(だれ)だった？

translation.en: for your science fair projects?
translation.ja: 最初(さいしょ)に試(ため)してたのは 誰(だれ)だった？

translation.en: Maybe if you two would just listen to each other,
translation.ja: お互(たが)いの話(はなし)を ちゃんと聞(き)けば―

translation.en: you might actually figure this out.
translation.ja: 解決(かいけつ)できるはずよ

translation.en: But until that time, effective immediately,  you are both off Mission Critical.
translation.ja: ミッションから外(はず)れて 頭(あたま)を冷(ひ)やしなさい

translation.en: A mysterious group calling itself SWAMP
translation.ja: なぞの集団(しゅうだん)スワンプが

translation.en: has infiltrated a government facility in the desert,
translation.ja: 砂漠(さばく)の政府施設(せいふしせつ)に侵入(しんにゅう) 砂漠(さばく)の政府施設(せいふしせつ)に侵入(しんにゅう) 〝ニュース速報(そくほう)〞

translation.en: making off with a cache of top- secret technology.
translation.ja: 〝ニュース速報(そくほう)〞 〝ニュース速報(そくほう)〞 極秘技術(ごくひぎじゅつ)を盗(ぬす)み出し 極秘技術(ごくひぎじゅつ)を盗(ぬす)み出し 極秘技術(ごくひぎじゅつ)を盗(ぬす)み出し 〝警察(けいさつ)が 輸送車(ゆそうしゃ)を追跡中〞(ついせきちゅう)

translation.en: All attempts to stop this convoy have been futile.
translation.ja: 〝警察(けいさつ)が 輸送車(ゆそうしゃ)を追跡中〞(ついせきちゅう) 〝警察(けいさつ)が 輸送車(ゆそうしゃ)を追跡中〞(ついせきちゅう) 逃走(とうそう)しています

translation.en: So, what is our plan again?
translation.ja: どうするって？

translation.en: Okay, the three of us are gonna stop that SWAMP convoy on our own.
translation.ja: ボクたちでスワンプを 止(と)めに行(い)く

translation.en: Whatever that tech is, can't be good in their hands.
translation.ja: 盗(ぬす)まれたものを取(と)り戻(もど)すんだ

translation.en: - - Copycat!
translation.ja: まねっ子か？

translation.en: - Mature. - You are.
translation.ja: そっちこそ 何(なん)だと？

translation.en: Fine. Since neither one of us is going to back down, let's agree to stay out of each other's way.
translation.ja: 止(と)めてもムダだからね 口出しはしないってことで

translation.en: Done!
translation.ja: ああ！

translation.en: - This is going to be a long mission. - Yeah, if we survive it.
translation.ja: 長(なが)い任務(にんむ)になりそうね 生き残(のこ)れればね

translation.en: There it is. Mission Critical, on my signal, get into position.
translation.ja: いた！ ミッション･クリティカル 合図(あいず)を待(ま)って

translation.en: Mission Most Critical,
translation.ja: ミッション･クリティカル 合図(あいず)を待(ま)って ミッション超クリティカル ボクが合図(あいず)する

translation.en: on my signal, go kick some SWAMP butt!
translation.ja: ミッション超クリティカル ボクが合図(あいず)する

translation.en: - Really? Mission Most Critical? - Yep. Jealous? Now!
translation.ja: ミッション超クリティカル？ うらやましい？ 行(い)くぞ！

translation.en: See? That's how it's done. So much for your boring tactics.
translation.ja: 見たか これが戦(たたか)いだ つまんない作戦(さくせん)はいらない

translation.en: Mission Critical, now!
translation.ja: ふたりとも 今(いま)よ

translation.en: What the...?
translation.ja: なんだ？

translation.en: - Jealous? - Look out!
translation.ja: どうよ？ 危(あぶ)ない！

translation.en: Let me go!
translation.ja: やめないか

translation.en: Sir Awesome!
translation.ja: オーサム様(さま)を助(たす)けなきゃ

translation.en: - We need to get in there and help! - I have an idea.
translation.ja: オーサム様(さま)を助(たす)けなきゃ 考(かんが)えがある

translation.en: Get behind them and follow my lead. Blobs away!
translation.ja: ヤツらの後(うし)ろに回(まわ)って いくわよ

translation.en: She missed!
translation.ja: ハズレだ

translation.en: - Scorpion! -
translation.ja: スコーピオン

translation.en: I'm on it!
translation.ja: 任(まか)せて

translation.en: OMG, the caravan's getting away!
translation.ja: 大変(たいへん)！　ヤツら逃(に)げる

translation.en: - Juni, take Ace. - Right. You take Scorpion.
translation.ja: エースを スコーピオンを

translation.en: Glitch, Sir Awesome, wait for our signal.
translation.ja: グリッチとオーサム様(さま)は待機(たいき)

translation.en: We're gonna need some Awesomese to jam those com- links.
translation.ja: オーサム語(ご)で 通信(つうしん)をダメにする

translation.en: - - Whoa! Crikey!
translation.ja: なんだよ

translation.en: Ace, are you okay?
translation.ja: エース 平気(へいき)か？

translation.en: Yeah.  - Just, uh, don't get me near them. -
translation.ja: ああ 鳥(とり)には 近(ちか)づきたくなくて

translation.en: Birds? You're afraid of birds?
translation.ja: 鳥(とり)がこわいの？

translation.en: I just, uh-- I don't trust 'em. With their wings, beaks, tiny birdie feet.
translation.ja: 信用(しんよう)ならないからな 翼(つばさ)も くちばしも 小さな足も

translation.en: I knew it, Mr. Perfect.
translation.ja: 覚(おぼ)えておくよ 完(かん)ペキさん

translation.en: Okay, Glitch, Awesome, hit it!
translation.ja: グリッチ　オーサム お願(ねが)い

translation.en: - My ears! - I can't steer!
translation.ja: 耳が！ 運転(うんてん)できない

translation.en: Thanks, ugly! I'll take this!
translation.ja: もらっていくよ
やったー！ もうサイコー

translation.en: - Hey, good work out there today. - Yeah, you too.
translation.ja: ねえ 大活躍(だいかつやく)だったね そっちも

translation.en: I guess there is a place for a little thinking mixed with the butt- kicking.
translation.ja: 作戦(さくせん)もあれば 勝(か)てるってわかった

translation.en: The trick will be figuring out the proper balance.
translation.ja: 力も作戦(さくせん)も どっちも大切(たいせつ)よね

translation.en: But if you're going to be on my team, you're gonna need to bone up on your battle tactics.
translation.ja: でも私(わたし)のチームに入るなら 作戦(さくせん)を勉強(べんきょう)して

translation.en: And if you're gonna be on my team, you need a cool code name.
translation.ja: ボクのチームなら コードネームがいる

translation.en: What do you think about Tango?
translation.ja: たとえば“タンゴ”

translation.en: Yeah, I like it. Thanks, Aztec.
translation.ja: そうね いいかも ありがと アステカ

translation.en: Oh, and remind me to tell you something about Ace. You won't believe it.
translation.ja: あと エースのことで 話(はなし)がある ビックリするよ

translation.en: Ugh! Will you stop already?
translation.ja: そういうのやめて

translation.en: Putting that news report up for them to see was a stroke of genius.
translation.ja: 店(みせ)のニュースは名案(めいあん)だった

translation.en: Call it mother's intuition.
translation.ja: 母(はは)の直感(ちょっかん)ってやつね

translation.en: They all have a lot left to learn,
translation.ja: まだこれからだが

translation.en: but the future of the OSS does seem very promising.
translation.ja: ＯＳＳの未来(みらい)は かなり明(あか)るいようだ

translation.en: To Mission Critical!
translation.ja: チーム結成(けっせい)に

translation.en: - Yes! - All right!
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: - We had a problem, sir. - What kind of problem?
translation.ja: 問題(もんだい)が起(お)きました 一体(いったい) どうしたんだ？

translation.en: The convoy, it was intercepted by a bunch of...
translation.ja: 輸送中(ゆそうちゅう)に襲(おそ)われました 複数(ふくすう)の… “スパイキッズ とくべつミッション”
